title: How to kill your husband
creator_contributor_role: National Heart Foundation of Australia. Victorian Division, funding
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
abstract: A daughter's story of her father's premature death from Heart Disease
description: Shirley's father, a skilled mechanic and excellent drummer, suffered from heart disease. Shirley retells her father's history, from the struggles of growing up during the depression to his now proud children, grandchildren and great-grandchildren. Made as part of 'The Heart of the Story' in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
